name: Limbo Lodge (F2022 Team 1)
description:
Limbo Lodge is a creepy escape room hosted by its mysterious owner, Teppy. The further you go into the game, the more warped things begin to appear... You will have to traverse through various levels of levers, portals, and gravity swaps to reach the end, and who knows what's waiting for you at the end..

Controls:  

W,A,S,D or arrow keys to move

Press A or D against wall mid-jump to wall cling

Click or Shift to air dash

V to deplete sanity

Z to zoom

ESC to pause

CREDITS:

art by @nagu_nak and @dysania000

soundtracks by Fletcher Li

sound effects from freesound.org
